detectors.description:
AccountProxy (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/kovan/sorted/0.8.0/63C30F352659BC02E0364e0F05E8211142FD6297_AccountProxy.sol/63C30F352659BC02E0364e0F05E8211142FD6297_AccountProxy.sol#12-49) may be an upgradeable proxy.
_opCodeAddress is declared in the proxy.
AccountProxy.delegate(bytes4)._opCodeAddress (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/kovan/sorted/0.8.0/63C30F352659BC02E0364e0F05E8211142FD6297_AccountProxy.sol/63C30F352659BC02E0364e0F05E8211142FD6297_AccountProxy.sol#37) gets value from a cross-contract call: opCenter.getOpCodeAddress(_sig)
OpCenterInterface appears to be a Registry contract for the proxy
The address of OpCenterInterface is stored as a state variable: AccountProxy.opCenter
Could not find setter for opCenter
Missing compatibility check in AccountProxy.fallback()
Missing compatibility check in AccountProxy.receive()
